original_title: GG Allin & The Murder Junkies - Raw, Brutal, Rough & Bloody - The Best of 1991 Live
overview: After spending 19 months in the Adrian, MI Correctional Facility, GG Allin was paroled in March 1991. Back in NYC, the Murder Junkies were ready to carry out GG's Rock & Roll Mission. In the Fall, GG Allin & The Murder Junkies set out on their first US Tour. This film ncludes 3 complete shows: San Diego 9/27/91, Chicago 10/10/91, and Atlanta 11/20/91.
title: GG Allin & The Murder Junkies - Raw, Brutal, Rough & Bloody - The Best of 1991 Live
